Description: Terracotta figure. Fragment of male torso. Mould made with traces of paint.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Identified on the basis of the find description and context. Probably an imported Greek style figure of Late Classical or early Hellenistic type from East Greece.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (DB.416) (Phase 3)
